info.name: HKGolden Dark Theme
info.description:
Dark and material theme for hkgolden.com.
-Things that got removed
--Control panel
--Second-hand market
--Google search
--SOME of the space that ad-blocker left behind
--Bunch of useless things at the end of the page
--Monthly star vote
-Things that got changed
--Background for most pages
--some non-essential icons (like those on the left of the topics panel)
--"favourite" , "report", "fast quote" buttons materialize, "quote" button removed
info.additionalInfo:
H.A. should be compatible, however there is no guarantee, no fixes for those issues are promised.
The priority of H.A. own theme system and Stylish is not known, you may hence want to disable its function before using this theme.

=Release Notes=
1.0.0 First Release
1.0.1 PM-related fix
1.0.3 minor fixes with techniques that hopefully improve performance.
